name: MEC Travel Light Top Load Pack - Unisex
description: Embrace spontaneous adventures and shift seamlessly between urban setting and wild places. The Travel Light series is light, compact and easy to stow inside a larger pack or piece of luggage on your way to and from your destination. The Travel Light Top Load Pack serves as a roomy daypack or an ultralight (though not exceptionally durable) summit pack.Made of lightweight 70-denier nylon ripstop with a water-resistant polyurethane coating.Contoured, slim shoulder straps have mesh backing for ventilation.Main compartment closes with a drawstring and a buckle.2 zippered pockets on the lid have glove-friendly zipper pulls.Removable foam back pad has prescored fold lines so you can stuff the entire pack into the lid pocket.2.5cm webbing waistbelt is removable.
